vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description1: To be the leading digital financial cooperative in our region, providing accessible, innovative, and member-centric financial services that empower individuals and communities to achieve financial prosperity and security.
vision.description2: We envision a future where every member has the tools and support needed to build wealth, secure their families' futures, and contribute to sustainable community development.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description1: To provide exceptional financial services through innovative digital platforms, fostering financial literacy, promoting savings culture, and offering affordable credit solutions to our members.
mission.description2: We are committed to delivering personalized service, maintaining the highest standards of integrity, and continuously adapting to meet the evolving needs of our community.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.subtitle: Understanding Cooperative Societies and Their Role

content.paragraph1: Cooperative societies are free organizations established by people who voluntarily organize their money, knowledge, and energy to meet their common economic, social, and cultural needs through democratic control.
content.paragraph2: According to Article 21, sub-articles 8 to 9 of Cooperative Societies Proclamation No. 985/2009, Savings and Credit Cooperative Societies are financial institutions established based on the free will and voluntary participation of people, founded on the spirit of cooperation, mutual assistance, and understanding, to provide microfinance services based on savings and credit.
content.paragraph3: Savings means the systematic use of money or property, eliminating wastefulness, setting aside from income for future needs, managing needs in an organized way, reducing daily consumption to save for future consumption - in short, thinking ahead. However, the lack of a unified model governance rule that can serve all Savings and Credit Cooperative Societies in a consistent manner has been a gap in the uniformity established by cooperative societies.
content.paragraph4: Most model governance rules prepared by cooperative societies are aligned with the Cooperative Societies Proclamation, and beyond that, there is a need to develop a system that allows leaders elected by the general assembly of cooperative societies to fulfill their mission, including expanding the powers of the general assembly through cooperative agreements and other internal agreements. Based on this, the Agency's Establishment Proclamation No. 85/2009 and the Federal Cooperative Societies Establishment Proclamation No. 985/2009 have made it necessary to prepare this Model Governance Rule for Savings and Credit Cooperative Societies.

loanApplication.subtitle: Mekenet Money Savings and Credit Cooperative Society (P.L.C.)

fields.loanReason: Reason for Loan Application in detail
fields.regularSavings: Amount of regular savings accumulated in the society
fields.lotterySavings: Amount of lottery savings accumulated in the society
fields.otherDebts: If there is other debt/more than one debt, specify for each
fields.otherDebtsDescription: Specify each debt separately if applicable
fields.supportingDocuments: List of various attached supporting documents
fields.declarationAgree: I confirm that the information provided is accurate, request the loan in accordance with the society's bylaws, and agree to use the borrowed funds only for the stated purpose and fulfill all society requirements.

loanApplication.declarationText: I hereby declare that the information provided in this loan application is true and accurate to the best of my knowledge. I understand that any false information may result in the rejection of my application or legal action. I agree to use the loan funds solely for the purpose stated in this application and to comply with all terms and conditions set forth by the Mekenet Money Savings and Credit Cooperative Society.

form.successDescription: Thank you for your loan application. We will review it and get back to you soon.
form.errorDescription: Please check your information and try again.
